group_1.textLeft: So we just have to collect kanji like this.

group_1.textRight: We have to make a word that expresses@New Year's congratulations!
A four letter word that uses the kanji@“all” 「全」...
That’s an amazing word!
But…it doesn’t really express@congratulations.

group_1.textLeft: So it's not good enough!@[chara:240000:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:240000:cheek_0][chara:240000:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:240000:lipSynch_1]How about…“devotion” 「全身全霊」?

group_1.textRight: Not bad!

group_1.textLeft: …Well, if we manage find the store that gives@the “spirit” 「霊」 kanji.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I'm sorry, Sayaka!
According to the rules, you can’t use the@same kanji twice!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry Madoka,@I didn't think to check.

group_1.textRight: It's okay, it was written in the fine@print, so...

group_1.textLeft: (They both are doing their best for my sake…)

group_1.textRight: Huh?![chara:200350:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]
This voice, it sounds familiar...
We meet again!@Happy New Year!
I see...
You're trying to find a four kanji word@using the “all” 「全」 kanji.
Then you should go for@“giving it your all” 「全力投球」!

group_1.textLeft: We'll need to look for the “strength” 「力」,@“throw” 「投」, and “ball” 「球」 kanji.

group_1.textRight: Madoka and Sayaka, what do you think?
We don't have much time left.
We should go to the place that's closer,@so we don't have to backtrack later.

group_1.textLeft: Then it's decided! We’ll form “giving it@your all” 「全力投球」!

group_1.textRight: The closest place has…the “ball” 「球」 kanji.
Um…

group_1.narration: Hint...@From base“ball” 「球」 to American football,@we have equipment for every “field” 「野」@sport you can think of!

group_1.textRight: That's a sport utilities shop.
They also have American football gear,@so maybe it's that store there...

group_1.textLeft: Natsuki, do you know the place?

group_1.textRight: Of course!@I'll lead the way!

group_1.textLeft: We got the “field” 「野」 and “ball” 「球」@kanji in this shop...
Every time I meet Natsuki, she helps me@in some way or another...

group_1.textRight: It's fine!
I always like to help people do their best,@not just in sports.
Even if I'm just trying to help Homura@find the shortest route...
I'll always give it my all!
Anyway, isn’t this already a four@kanji word?

Look, with this and this card, it forms…@[chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300201:cheek_0][chara:300201:motion_200][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]“all players” 「全員野球」!

group_1.textLeft: It could mean something like...@“Everyone working together as a team,” right?

group_1.textRight: Well, even if it's not the word you're looking for,
you can use it as a back-up!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, let’s try to form “giving it your all” 「全力投球」!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, do your best!
GO! GO! HOMURA!

group_1.textLeft: S-stop, Nasuki!@Everybody is looking at us...

group_1.textRight: OKAY!@GO! FIGHT! WIN!
